text: Stefan Karlsson may refer to: *Stefan Karlsson (badminton) (born 1955), Swedish badminton player *Stefan Karlsson (footballer) (born 1988), Swedish footballer *Stefan Karlsson (professor) (born 1950), professor of molecular medicine and gene therapy *Stefan Karlsson (snowboarder) (born 1981), Swedish snowboarder *Stefan Karlsson, a player for the Sweden national bandy team
title: Stefan Karlsson
